original_text: and it shall be to him and to his descendants after him the covenant of a perpetual priesthood, because he was jealous for his God and made atonement for the people of Israel.’”
korean_text: 그와 그의 후손에게 영원한 제사장 직분의 언약이라 그가 그의 하나님을 위하여 질투하여 이스라엘 자손을 속죄하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: and it shall be to him and to his descendants after him
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그와 그의 후손에게 주어질 것이며

sentences.original_text: the covenant of a perpetual priesthood
because he was jealous for his God
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 하나님을 위해 열심을 냈기 때문이니

sentences.original_text: and made atonement for the people of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘 백성을 위해 속죄했기 때문입니다
